survey_name: Electric Bicycle Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on user experiences, satisfaction levels, and preferences regarding electric bicycles (e-bikes). The data will help manufacturers and service providers improve product offerings and customer service.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use your electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all potential usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use your electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose an electric bicycle over a traditional bicycle?
answer_options: Ease of commuting (e.g., less physical effort)
Cost savings compared to other transportation
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional text input for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose an electric bicycle over a traditional bicycle?
answer_options: Ease of commuting (e.g., less physical effort)
Cost savings compared to other transportation

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting an electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option for additional responses.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting an electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future electric bicycle models?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future electric bicycle models?
